member.name: T:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.Sample.XInputGamepad.SetVibration
member.summary: Sets the amount of vibration in the left and right rumble motors. The left motor is the low-frequency rumble motor. The right motor is the high-frequency rumble motor. This notification is raised when the vibration settings are changed.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.Sample.XInputGamepad.QueryControllers
member.summary: Gets the list of attached controllers.
